Time had passed and by now Lady Hawks creations had grown. they were now
about four feet in height and learning quickly. They were held in Stasis
fields keeping them in thier place. Each had recieved the agression of it's
animal side, if the bot that recieved the samples got those it would be
uncontrollable.

She opened her comm to Zarddus getting his answering machine.

"Sorry, I'm out destroying, plundering, and killing right now, or I'm home
and just plotting to, either way I'm not answering, leave your name and
number after the beep and I'll get back at- ER I mean back To you." it says
playing punishing elevator music dureing the pause before the beep Zardus
truly was a Sadist.

BEEEEEP

Lord Zardus, I have the samples you asked for come and see them for yourself
and I'm sure you'll aprove and I can leave." Lady Hawk says in her usual
courteous tone. She knew that it was propper to use a high ranking bots
title with his name even when there was only limited respect for the bot.

----- Original Message -----
From: CYBERWOLF4 <cyberwolf4@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, May 28, 2001 9:08 AM
Subject: Lady Hawk


> OOC since she never got her samples I'll pick Lady Hawk up from here.
>
>
> BIC Lady Hawk grew tired of waiting, If Zardus had lied about providing
her
> samples for her experiments she decided to provide her own. She searched
> through her DNA samples and decided to use Scorpion and Snake DNA fused
with
> theAlien DNA Zardus had provided. A small pool of DNA sat before her,
> already beginning to grow. Much like Doctor Frankenstein she was creating
a
> monster and didn't even know it.
>
>
>
